channel.title: PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - November
item.description: November was marked by the first PrestaShop Developer Conference in Paris.

item.title: Do You Speak PrestaShop? – October 2023 Edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about coding, it’s also about taking part in the PrestaShop translation project! This report will tell you how the software translations evolved in October 2023.

item.title: PrestaShop Developer Conference in Paris: Program and Registration
item.description: If you’re a PrestaShop developer or enthusiast looking to broaden your knowledge and connect with fellow community members, the PrestaShop Developer Conference is the event for you.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - October
item.description: In this Core Monthly, check out what we’ve been up to in October with PrestaShop’s core and modules. Also, get a sneak peek at the agenda and speakers for the upcoming PrestaShop Developer Conference.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - October 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the ninth time this year and streamed live on October 11th, 2023.

item.title: Announcing October PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The ninth Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, October 11th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: Do You Speak PrestaShop? – September 2023 Edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about coding, it’s also about taking part in the PrestaShop translation project! This report will tell you how the software translations evolved in September 2023.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - September
item.description: In this article, delve into September’s updates and news from the project. As well as Hacktoberfest 2023’s kick off, offering a month-long celebration of open-source contributions. Keep reading for more information.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.1.2 is available
item.description: The second patch for PrestaShop 8.1 is available! This release contains 2 security fixes, over 30 bugs have been fixed and some minor improvements have been integrated.

item.title: Hacktoberfest 2023
item.description: The month of October is coming quickly! So be prepared for Hacktoberfest, a month-long celebration of open source software.

item.title: Do You Speak PrestaShop? – August 2023 Edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about the code, it’s also about taking part in the PrestaShop translation project! This report will tell you how the software translations evolved in August 2023.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - September 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the eighth time this year and streamed live on September 13th, 2023.

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - August
item.description: A little later than usual, discover the latest happenings in the PrestaShop Project for August 2023. We had a productive month, successfully merging more than 240 pull requests and releasing PrestaShop 8.1.1 and some security patches. Read on to find out more!

item.title: Announcing September PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The eighth Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, September 13th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube!

item.title: Do You Speak PrestaShop? – July 2023 Edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about the code, it’s also about taking part in the PrestaShop translation project! This report will tell you how the software translations evolved in July.
